'''20w15a''' is the eleventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on April 8, 2020,<ref name="20w15a">{{snap|20w15a|April 8, 2020}}</ref> which adds a new Nether biome, new music tracks, new blocks, and other changes and fixes.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Blackstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Blackstone]]'''
* Generates in basalt deltas.
* Can be used in place of cobblestone to craft furnaces and stone tools.
* Has a slab, stair, and wall variant.

'''{{Animate|Blackstone Slab JE1.png; Blackstone Stairs (N) JE1.png; Blackstone Wall JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Blackstone slab]], [[blackstone stairs]], [[blackstone wall]]'''
* Decorative blocks crafted from blackstone.

'''[[File:Chiseled Nether Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Chiseled Nether bricks]]'''
* New variant of [[Nether bricks]].
* Crafted from 2 Nether brick slabs.

'''[[File:Chiseled Polished Blackstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Chiseled polished blackstone]]'''
* Decorative block crafted from polished blackstone.

'''[[File:Cracked Nether Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cracked Nether bricks]]'''
* New variant of Nether bricks.
* Obtained by smelting Nether bricks in a furnace.

'''[[File:Cracked Polished Blackstone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cracked polished blackstone bricks]]'''
* Decorative blocks crafted from polished blackstone.

'''[[File:Gilded Blackstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gilded blackstone]]'''
* Has a chance of dropping 2–5 [[gold nugget]]s (increased with Fortune), or it drops itself instead.
* Currently only available via the Creative inventory or by using commands.

'''[[File:Polished Blackstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Polished blackstone]]'''
* Crafted with 4 blackstone.
* Has a chiseled, slab, stair, and wall variant.
* Can be crafted into buttons and pressure plates.

'''[[File:Polished Blackstone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Polished blackstone bricks]]'''
* Crafted with 4 polished blackstone.
* Has a cracked, slab, stair, and wall variant.

'''{{Animate|Polished Blackstone Brick Slab JE1 BE1.png; Polished Blackstone Brick Stairs (N) JE1 BE1.png; Polished Blackstone Brick Wall JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Polished blackstone brick slab]], [[polished blackstone brick stairs]], [[polished blackstone brick wall]]'''
* Decorative blocks crafted from polished blackstone bricks.

'''{{Animate|Polished Blackstone Button JE1 BE1.png; Polished Blackstone Pressure Plate JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Polished blackstone button]] and [[polished blackstone pressure plate]]'''
* Redstone blocks crafted from polished blackstone.
* Work like their stone counterparts.

'''{{Animate|Polished Blackstone Slab JE1 BE1.png; Polished Blackstone Stairs (N) JE1 BE1.png; Polished Blackstone Wall JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Polished blackstone slab]], [[polished blackstone stairs]], and [[polished blackstone wall]]'''
* Decorative blocks crafted from polished blackstone.

'''[[File:Quartz Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Quartz bricks]]'''
* A decorative block crafted from 4 [[blocks of quartz]].

'''[[File:Soul Campfire JE1 BE1.gif|32px]] [[Soul campfire]]'''
* Has a blue flame instead of orange.
* Has a light level of 10.
* Does the same amount of damage as a regular campfire.
* Crafted with soul sand or soul soil instead of coal.
* Piglins are repelled by soul campfires.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Snout banner pattern.png|16px]] [[Piglin banner pattern]]'''
* New pattern for banners, the "Piglin".
* Used in the [[loom]] to apply the piglin pattern to the banner.
* Currently unobtainable in Survival mode.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Biome]]s'''
* {{BiomeLink|Basalt deltas}}
** A volcanic biome in the Nether. Fog effects have flakes of volcanic ash.
** Filled with pillars of [[basalt]] and large areas of [[blackstone]].
** [[Ghast]]s, [[magma cube]]s, and [[strider]]s spawn in this biome.

=== General ===
'''Accessibility'''
* Chat line spacing can now be adjusted.
* A chat delay can be set between 0 (default) and 6 seconds.

'''[[Music]]'''
* Added 3 new soundtracks to [[the Nether]], composed by Lena Raine: "Rubedo", "Chrysopoeia" and "So Below."
** "Rubedo" plays in the [[Nether wastes]] biome.
** "Chrysopoeia" plays in the [[crimson forest]] biome.
** "So Below" plays in the [[soul sand valley]] and [[basalt deltas]] biomes.

'''Sound'''
* Added 31 [[ambient]] sounds for the basalt deltas.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added <code>campfires</code> block tag.
** Contains campfires and soul campfires.
** [[Bee]]s, [[parrot]]s, and [[turtle]]s view blocks in this tag as dealing fire damage, and pathfind accordingly.
** Campfires use this tag to determine if they are lit or not.
** Flint and steel uses this tag to determine if it can light campfires.
* Added <code>guarded_by_piglins</code> block tag.
** Contains container blocks ([[chest]]s, [[trapped chest]]s, [[ender chest]]s, [[barrel]]s, the <code>[[Tag#blocks shulker_boxes|shulker_boxes]]</code> block tag) and gold blocks ([[blocks of gold]], [[gilded blackstone]], and the <code>[[Tag#blocks gold_ores|gold_ores]]</code> block tag).
** [[Piglin]]s become hostile towards a player that destroys or use a block in this tag.
* Added <code>furnace_materials</code> item tag.
** Contains [[cobblestone]] and [[blackstone]].
** Items in this tag can be used to craft furnaces and unlock the recipe in the recipe book.
* Added <code>stone_tool_materials</code> item tag.
** Contains cobblestone and blackstone.
** Items in this tag can be used to craft stone tools and unlock the recipes in the recipe book.
* Added <code>soul_fire_base_blocks</code> item tag.
** Parallels the block tag.
** Contains [[soul sand]] and [[soul soil]].
** Items in this tag can be used to craft [[soul fire torch]]es and [[soul campfire]]s and unlock the recipes in the recipe book.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Dispenser]]s'''
* Can now saddle [[pig]]s, [[strider]]s, and tamed [[horse]]s, [[donkey]]s and [[mule]]s.
* Can now put [[horse armor]] on tamed horses.
* Can now put [[carpet]]s on tamed [[llama]]s.
* Can now put [[chest]]s on tamed llamas, donkeys, and mules.
* Can now shear [[mooshroom]]s and [[snow golem]]s.

'''[[Furnace]]s'''
* Can now be crafted with [[blackstone]].

'''[[Soul fire torch]]es'''
* Can now also be crafted with [[soul sand]].

'''[[Wall]]s'''
* Now connect to the bottom and sides of [[glass pane]]s and [[iron bars]].
* Now connect to the bottom of [[sea pickle]]s.

=== Items ===
'''Stone [[axe]]s, [[hoe]]s, [[pickaxe]]s, [[shovel]]s, and [[sword]]s'''
* Can now be crafted with blackstone.

'''[[Hoe]]s'''
* Are now the default tool for mining [[leaves]].
** [[Shears]] are still used for ''collecting'' leaf blocks.

'''[[Nether fungus]], [[Nether sprouts]], [[crimson roots]], [[warped roots]], [[Nether wart]], [[Nether wart block]]s, [[warped wart block]]s, [[twisting vines]], and [[weeping vines]]'''
* Can now be composted.

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* Mobs now avoid walking on [[magma block]]s and lit [[campfire]]s.

'''[[Hoglin]]s'''
* Baby hoglins no longer drop loot (but still drop [[experience]]).

'''[[Magma cube]]s'''
* Spawn commonly in basalt deltas.

'''[[Piglin]]s'''
* Now avoid soul campfires.
* Now become hostile towards any player that breaks a chest, trapped chest, ender chest, barrel, gold ore, Nether gold ore, gilded blackstone, or a gold block.

'''[[Strider]]s'''
* Now turn blueish-purple outside of lava.
** When outside lava, their facial expression becomes a more prominent frown.
* Can now only spawn if the block above the lava is air.
* Baby striders ride on top of bigger striders.

'''[[Zoglin]]s'''
* Are now considered [[undead]].

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added polished blackstone, and (where applicable) blackstone blocks and items to the {{cd|buttons|slabs|stairs|walls|d=and}} block and item tags.
* Added soul campfires to the <code>piglin_repellents</code> block tag.
* Added the <code>[[Tag#blocks signs|#signs]]</code> block tag and removed lanterns and soul fire lanterns from the <code>wall_post_override</code> block tag.

=== Textures ===
'''[[Strider]]'''
* Changed strider texture from [[File:Strider Texture JE1.png|128px]] to [[File:Strider Texture JE2.png|64px]] to remove an unused fin. The fin itself was not vieweable in-game.

== Trivia ==
* The word "[[wikipedia:wikt:rubedo|Rubedo]]" is Latin for "redness", it was adopted by alchemists to refer to the final stage of creating the philosopher's stone, it is also likely associated with the red-colored environment of the Nether.
* The word "[[wikipedia:Chrysopoeia|Chrysopoeia]]" is an alchemical term that describes the creation of the philosopher's stone, or the transmutation of a given object into gold.
